name: Make Your Dungeon
description:
A short yet challenging hand-drawn roguelike.

Make Your Dungeon is a roguelike action game, set on the desk and papers of a bored office worker, who will act as a narrator.

Dodge, attack and get through lots of enemies and bosses to reach the end of the Drawn Dungeon.

Made for casual or experienced players, to have a fun time advancing the dungeon, finding new items and ways to fight enemies, while customizing the dungeon with your own drawings!

Controls

WASD - Moving

Left Click - Attack on mouse direction

Space - Use active item

Esc/Tab - Pause or resume game

E - Interact (with windows/buttons)

M - Mute game's music

Development

This is the first playable version of my game 'Make Your Dungeon', I will try to keep updating it with new features, new items, new monsters and a lot more dialogs for the narrator and new player drawing options.

Keep in mind it may have bugs since its still in development, and feel free to comment those to me.
